CustomField.description: Formula to pull Product Family of the product. This will be used for reports.
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( SBQQ__Product__r.Family ), "10", "Colocation", "DC Build", "DC Build", "12", "Network & Connectivity", "13", "IT Security", "14", "Yotta Cloud", "15", "Private Cloud", "16", "Federated Fund", "17", "IT Management", "18", "Traded Goods", "")
CustomField.label: Product Family
